Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Toto Nyasaye awulile likhuwa liabalia boboola mbu “Nyasaye toto ni umumanani nafu khuli abayinda,” khwandichile kababoola nende okhwira khwabu Abarumwa munjila ilali yatoto. Ne khulibaboolela inyanga yeyindukho mbu; “Mupile eshinyasio shiokhuyia.”
Kano nishichila akemikhono chenyu chiaranjilisia ne mbu toto Nyasaye Shali wokhukholela obubii abandu tawe

Balia baboola mbu; “Nyasaye akhulachile mbu khulasuubila Omurumwa yesiyesi tawe okhuula okhurusilie eshihanwa(isolo) isambwe nende omulilo.” Baboolele mbu; “Abarumwa babetsela nende ebifune biabulafu nende shinga kamurebanga kano, kho shichila shina nimubera toto nimuba nimuboolanga obulaamba.”
Ne nibakhukhaya bamala okhukhaya Abarumwa bandi imbeli wuwo, abetsa nende ebifune bilolekha nende ebitabu bia machesi, nende eshitabu shiobulafu

Buli omundu alipila lifwa, mana toto mulihebwa omurungo kwenyu inyanga yeyindukho, ulia ulisitibwa ehale nomulilo, alinjisibwa mwikulu, oyo aliba aburire. Ne obulamu bwokhushialo shineshindu tawe halali okhwisangasia khwokhwikatia

Ne toto mwitsa okhunyoola emiresio mumiandu chienyu nende mwinywe abeene. Ne khandi toto mulawulila kabasinyisia amanji okhurulana nende Abandu bahebwa eshitabu, imbeli wenyu, nende balia Abatsokaasi. Ne ni mwifwila mana mwaria Nyasaye, toto ako ni amakhuwa amalayi muno kokhukhola

Ne olwa Nyasaye yalakana nende balia bahebwa eshitabu mbu; “Ni okhula mwinosilie abandu, ne shimulafisa tawe.” Basukuna indakano eyo inyuma wemikongo chiabu nenibakula obukusi obufwolwa, kho neshibi muno eshiabakula esho
Olabaparira balia abasangalanga akabakholele, ne nibachama okhulaywa khukabalakholele,	olabaparira	mbu balihonokokha nende eshinyasio tawe. Baliba nende eshinyasio eshilulu
Ne obwami bwomwikulu nende mushialo nibwa Nyasaye, ne Nyasaye nomunyali wabuli eshindu
